ManageTranslations

Manages the translations of certain keys saved into the translations.json

Module Contents¶

code_SemperKI.utilities.locales.loggerError¶
class code_SemperKI.utilities.locales.ManageTranslations(filePathAndName)¶

Manages the translations of certain keys saved into the translations.json

filePathAndName¶
redisCon¶
retrieveContentFromRedis(initial=False) → str¶

Check if the key is inside redis, if it is, take it from there, if not, save it for faster access

Returns:

The translation as JSON

Return type:

str

getTranslation(locale: str, keyArr: list[str]) → str¶

Get the correct translation for a certain list of keys from the json

Parameters:

  • locale (str) – The locale string retrieved from either the profile or the session

  • keyArr (list[str]) – path to take inside the json e.g. email, subjects, confirmedByClient

Returns:

The correct word/sentence

Return type:

str
